code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={addNewBoxerOpen:false};export var addBoxerSlice=createSlice({name:'addBoxer',initialState:initialState,reducers:{addNewBoxer:function addNewBoxer(state,action){state.addNewBoxerOpen=true;},closeNewBoxer:function closeNewBoxer(state,action){state.addNewBoxerOpen=false;}}});var _addBoxerSlice$action=addBoxerSlice.actions,addNewBoxer=_addBoxerSlice$action.addNewBoxer,closeNewBoxer=_addBoxerSlice$action.closeNewBoxer;export{addNewBoxer,closeNewBoxer};export var selectAddBoxer=function selectAddBoxer(state){return state.addBoxer.addNewBoxerOpen;};export default addBoxerSlice.reducer;
